languages.text: "Черта! Черта, прочерченная для слабых и незнающих! Любой, в чьих силах взвешивать риски и принимать просчитанное решение, поступил бы как я! Защитить домен Империума! Даже нанести упреждающий удар... Фон Валанциус!" {n}Эмелина резко поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Прост{mf|ой|ая} смертн{mf|ый|ая}, наделенн{mf|ый|ая} огромной властью и привилегиями, правящ{mf|ий|ая} мирами и распоряжающ{mf|ийся|аяся} миллионами жизней. Скажи — поступил{mf||а} бы ты так же, как я, в моей ситуации?"

"The line? Lines are for the weak and ignorant! Anyone capable of weighing the risks and making a calculated decision would have done the same as me! To protect the Imperium's domain! To deliver a pre-emptive strike, even... Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina whips around to you.{/n} "You are a simple mortal endowed with huge power and privilege, ruling over worlds and holding millions of lives in the palm of your hand. Tell me — would you have done the same in my position?"
languages.original_text: "Черта! Черта, прочерченная для слабых и незнающих! Любой, в чьих силах взвешивать риски и принимать просчитанное решение, поступил бы как я! Защитить домен Империума! Даже нанести упреждающий удар... Фон Валанциус!" {n}Эмелина резко поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Прост{mf|ой|ая} смертн{mf|ый|ая}, наделенн{mf|ый|ая} огромной властью и привилегиями, правящ{mf|ий|ая} мирами и распоряжающ{mf|ийся|аяся} миллионами жизней. Скажи — поступил{mf||а} бы ты так же, как я, в моей ситуации?"

languages.text: “红线？红线是为弱者与蠢货准备的！但凡是有能力权衡风险，有能力深思熟虑，作出决定的人，肯定会与我做出同样的选择！这么做是为了保护帝国的领地！是为了先发制人，攻击敌人，甚至……冯·瓦兰修斯！”{n}艾米莉娜转过身，对你开了口。{/n}“你是一位普通的凡人，拥有巨大的权力与特权。你统治着无数世界，亿万人的生死都在你的掌控之中。告诉我，如果换做是你，你也会这么做吗？”
languages.original_text: "The line? Lines are for the weak and ignorant! Anyone capable of weighing the risks and making a calculated decision would have done the same as me! To protect the Imperium's domain! To deliver a pre-emptive strike, even... Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina whips around to you.{/n} "You are a simple mortal endowed with huge power and privilege, ruling over worlds and holding millions of lives in the palm of your hand. Tell me — would you have done the same in my position?"

traits.locale_text: “红线？红线是为弱者与蠢货准备的！但凡是有能力权衡风险，有能力深思熟虑，作出决定的人，肯定会与我做出同样的选择！这么做是为了保护帝国的领地！是为了先发制人，攻击敌人，甚至……冯·瓦兰修斯！”{n}艾米莉娜转过身，对你开了口。{/n}“你是一位普通的凡人，拥有巨大的权力与特权。你统治着无数世界，亿万人的生死都在你的掌控之中。告诉我，如果换做是你，你也会这么做吗？”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «¿La línea? ¡Las líneas son para los débiles y los ignorantes! ¡Cualquiera capaz de sopesar los riesgos y tomar una decisión ponderada habría hecho lo mismo que yo: proteger los dominios del Imperium! ¡Dar un golpe preventivo, incluso!... ¡Von Valancius!». {n}Emelina se da media vuelta para mirarte.{/n} «Es un{mf||a} simple mortal investid{mf|o|a} con unos poderes y privilegios inmensos, con el control de mundos enteros y millones de vidas en la palma de su mano. Dígame: ¿habría hecho lo mismo que yo en mi lugar?».
languages.original_text: "The line? Lines are for the weak and ignorant! Anyone capable of weighing the risks and making a calculated decision would have done the same as me! To protect the Imperium's domain! To deliver a pre-emptive strike, even... Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina whips around to you.{/n} "You are a simple mortal endowed with huge power and privilege, ruling over worlds and holding millions of lives in the palm of your hand. Tell me — would you have done the same in my position?"

traits.locale_text: «¿La línea? ¡Las líneas son para los débiles y los ignorantes! ¡Cualquiera capaz de sopesar los riesgos y tomar una decisión ponderada habría hecho lo mismo que yo: proteger los dominios del Imperium! ¡Dar un golpe preventivo, incluso!... ¡Von Valancius!». {n}Emelina se da media vuelta para mirarte.{/n} «Es un{mf||a} simple mortal investid{mf|o|a} con unos poderes y privilegios inmensos, con el control de mundos enteros y millones de vidas en la palma de su mano. Dígame: ¿habría hecho lo mismo que yo en mi lugar?».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「ライン？ラインは弱者と無知の為のものだ！リスクを天秤にかけ、計算高い決断を下せる者なら、私と同じことをしただろう！帝国の領土を守るためだ！先制攻撃をするためなら、たとえ…フォン・ヴァランシウスでも同じことをしただろう！」{n}エメリナがあなたを刺激する。{/n}あなたは巨大な力と特権を与えられた単純な死すべき運命にある人間の1人で、惑星を支配し、何百万もの命を掌中に収めている。教えてください。あなたが私の立場だったら同じことをしたでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "The line? Lines are for the weak and ignorant! Anyone capable of weighing the risks and making a calculated decision would have done the same as me! To protect the Imperium's domain! To deliver a pre-emptive strike, even... Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina whips around to you.{/n} "You are a simple mortal endowed with huge power and privilege, ruling over worlds and holding millions of lives in the palm of your hand. Tell me — would you have done the same in my position?"

traits.locale_text: 「ライン？ラインは弱者と無知の為のものだ！リスクを天秤にかけ、計算高い決断を下せる者なら、私と同じことをしただろう！帝国の領土を守るためだ！先制攻撃をするためなら、たとえ…フォン・ヴァランシウスでも同じことをしただろう！」{n}エメリナがあなたを刺激する。{/n}あなたは巨大な力と特権を与えられた単純な死すべき運命にある人間の1人で、惑星を支配し、何百万もの命を掌中に収めている。教えてください。あなたが私の立場だったら同じことをしたでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « J'ai dépassé les bornes ? Ces bornes sont faites pour les faibles et les ignorants ! Toute personne capable de jauger les risques et de prendre une décision raisonnée aurait fait la même chose que moi ! Pour protéger le domaine de l'Imperium ! Pour lancer une attaque préventive, même... Von Valancius ! {n}s'exclame Emelina en se tournant brusquement vers vous.{/n} Vous êtes {mf|un simple mortel|une simple mortelle} à qui l'on a accordé un pouvoir et un privilège incommensurables ; vous régnez sur une multitude de mondes et tenez des millions de vies dans le creux de votre main. Dites-moi... Auriez-vous fait la même chose, à ma place ? »
languages.original_text: "The line? Lines are for the weak and ignorant! Anyone capable of weighing the risks and making a calculated decision would have done the same as me! To protect the Imperium's domain! To deliver a pre-emptive strike, even... Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina whips around to you.{/n} "You are a simple mortal endowed with huge power and privilege, ruling over worlds and holding millions of lives in the palm of your hand. Tell me — would you have done the same in my position?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai dépassé les bornes ? Ces bornes sont faites pour les faibles et les ignorants ! Toute personne capable de jauger les risques et de prendre une décision raisonnée aurait fait la même chose que moi ! Pour protéger le domaine de l'Imperium ! Pour lancer une attaque préventive, même... Von Valancius ! {n}s'exclame Emelina en se tournant brusquement vers vous.{/n} Vous êtes {mf|un simple mortel|une simple mortelle} à qui l'on a accordé un pouvoir et un privilège incommensurables ; vous régnez sur une multitude de mondes et tenez des millions de vies dans le creux de votre main. Dites-moi... Auriez-vous fait la même chose, à ma place ? »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Die Grenze? Grenzen sind etwas für Schwächlinge und Unwissende! Alle, die Risiken abwägen und eine fundierte Entscheidung treffen können, hätten genauso gehandelt wie ich! Zum Schutz des Gebiets des Imperiums! Ein Präventivschlag, auch wenn ... Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|ein einfacher Sterblicher|eine einfache Sterbliche}, ausgestattet mit großer Macht und Privilegien, Ihr herrscht über Welten und Millionen von Menschenleben. Sagt mir – hättet Ihr an meiner Stelle dasselbe getan?"
languages.original_text: "The line? Lines are for the weak and ignorant! Anyone capable of weighing the risks and making a calculated decision would have done the same as me! To protect the Imperium's domain! To deliver a pre-emptive strike, even... Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina whips around to you.{/n} "You are a simple mortal endowed with huge power and privilege, ruling over worlds and holding millions of lives in the palm of your hand. Tell me — would you have done the same in my position?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Grenze? Grenzen sind etwas für Schwächlinge und Unwissende! Alle, die Risiken abwägen und eine fundierte Entscheidung treffen können, hätten genauso gehandelt wie ich! Zum Schutz des Gebiets des Imperiums! Ein Präventivschlag, auch wenn ... Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "Ihr seid {mf|ein einfacher Sterblicher|eine einfache Sterbliche}, ausgestattet mit großer Macht und Privilegien, Ihr herrscht über Welten und Millionen von Menschenleben. Sagt mir – hättet Ihr an meiner Stelle dasselbe getan?"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Çizgi mi? Çizgiler zayıflar ve cahiller içindir! Riskleri tartıp iyi planlanmış kararlar verme yetisine sahip herkes, benim yaptığımı yapardı! İmparatorluk'un diyarlarını korurdu! Hatta ilk saldıran olurdu! Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina hızla yanına yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Sen büyük güç ve imtiyaz bahşedilmiş, sıradan bir fânisin. Ancak dünyalara hükmediyor, milyonlarca canın kaderini iki dudağının arasında tutuyorsun. Söylesene, yerimde olsan aynısını yapar mıydın?"
languages.original_text: "The line? Lines are for the weak and ignorant! Anyone capable of weighing the risks and making a calculated decision would have done the same as me! To protect the Imperium's domain! To deliver a pre-emptive strike, even... Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina whips around to you.{/n} "You are a simple mortal endowed with huge power and privilege, ruling over worlds and holding millions of lives in the palm of your hand. Tell me — would you have done the same in my position?"

traits.locale_text: "Çizgi mi? Çizgiler zayıflar ve cahiller içindir! Riskleri tartıp, iyi planlanmış bir karar verme yetisine sahip herkes benimle aynı şeyi yapardı! İmparatorluk'un diyarlarını korumak! Hatta ilk saldırıyı gerçekleştirmek! Von Valancius!" {n}Emelina hızla yanına yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Sen büyük bir güç ve imtiyaz bahşedilmiş basit bir fânisin ancak dünyalara hükmediyor, milyonlarca hayatı avucunun içinde tutuyorsun. Söylesene, benim yerimde olsan sen de aynı şeyi yapar mıydın?"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
